Text: Question, what does one do if they receive an error that states "Connection Refused"?
as always, i purchase the artist albums as soon as i find them that i download, i think this was the fastest album i purchased since i started to download lol.
@torntpnk If you buy it, why would you want the torrent?

@KevanGC Maybe he downloads before buying so he can preview the album -- make sure it's worth his money. From a legal standpoint, that's the correct way to pirate media. xP
I do the same sometimes -- for example, I preordered Korn's newest album, The Path of Totality, but downloaded the torrent because the CD was released to stores before the preorder bundles were mailed out.
